amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds to enforce the Code of Federal Regulations regarding biomass.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 4 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill to enforce the Code of Federal Regulations regarding biomass.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poliquin amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Poliquin amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Poliquin.
